Reviews.Title: palm treo
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: hey the phone I got was a verison wireless palm treo 700. The phone works but it's got no charger.  I orderd a sprint phone and didn't get it I need 2 find out how 2 send it back and geta different product but for this being my first buy I may not come back. Well see.

Reviews.Title: Not Mint
Reviews.Author: Silverado
Reviews.Content: Was not satisfied with the product due to the mis-representation of it's quality.  It wasn't in mint condition nor was there a new housing as indicated in it's description. A true description would have been more accepting even for the price.

Reviews.Title: terrible seller
Reviews.Author: bbwrgv
Reviews.Content: phone was not usable, DID NOT WORK, was finally able to contact seller; received a replacement but came without a battery or charger.  how did they expect me to use the darn phone?  will never purchase from them again.  finally had to go through amazon customer service to receive a refund.

Reviews.Title: Palm Treo
Reviews.Author: Mr. Flip
Reviews.Content: A great (better) substitute for the Blackberry. Good quality phone that has given me no problems. A little dated now that android has taken over the market, but overall a good phone.

Reviews.Title: Purchasing Manager
Reviews.Author: billatncppb
Reviews.Content: I owned a Palm Treo Phone for over 3 years, and it died recently.  Got a new phone from Sprint, however, was not the quality and features that my old Palm did. Although this phone is no longer in production, I was able to get an updated Palm Treo from Amazon, and am very happy with it. Although the newer phone has different features, which I am still getting used to, I am very satisfied with it....
